modName: Metal Max series Music- An RPG game music alternative

中文说明：这是一个RPG游戏的音乐

descriptionHtml:
English Description:
This is a RPG game music.
Game Name:METAL MAX1
Game link:http://metalmaniax.com/
This is just the first generation of Metal Max.
So, I would later release more versions!
For example：METAL SAGA. METAL MAX 3. METAL MAX 2.
Finally, I will Integrate an integrated version.
Used MOD:Personalized Music - Add your own music to Skyrim:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13286/?

Required:
Updated version of Skyrim
Dawnguard DLC
Dragonborn DLC

If it involves copyright issues, please remind me.
Enjoy it, and sorry for my English

中文说明：这是一个RPG游戏的音乐
原游戏名：重装机兵
原游戏网址:http://metalmaniax.com/
这只是第一个版本，因此我以后会添加更多的版本，比如重装机兵1代，重装机兵2，重装机兵3…
最后我还会整合一个所有音乐的版本。
author: LingYang Tan
